description: Portable Library Tools is a Visual Studio add-in from Microsoft that enables you to create C# and Visual Basic libraries that run on a variety of .NET-based platforms without recompilation. Installs with /buildmachine switch, to avoid installing Visual Studio dependencies on a build machine.
